group.volunteeringText: If you would like to find out more about being a volunteer with us, please e-mail with your interest and we’ll be in contact as soon as possible.
group.donationsText: Use the button below to find out about making a donation to support our group.

profile.title: Apprenticeships Store
profile.subtitle: The UK's first independent Apprenticeships Store.
profile.quote: We offer help and support to young people finding an apprenticeship that is suitable to their knowledge and skills.
profile.body:
In January 2014, we launched the UK’s first independent Apprenticeships Store. The store can help help young people learn about apprenticeships and can offer support and advice in finding a role that is suitable for your knowledge and skills.

The store enables members of the public to:

 - register on the National Apprenticeship Service vacancy online website
 - find information and advice about apprenticeships
 - view hundreds of current apprenticeship vacancies with national and local employers
 - apply for an apprenticeship vacancy
 - receive assistance with interview techniques
 - gain an insight into the workplace by speaking to current apprentices.

The Apprenticeships Store is designed to be a friendly, welcoming, informal environment where anyone can drop in at any time and get advice and help.

![Apprenticeships store computers](//images.contentful.com/6cfgzlmcakf7/5FzlOtXP320yqaIwauMaGM/a8e7bcfcf47de682ea909dbbff54d22d/Apprenticeship_store_computers.jpg)

profiles.subtitle: The UK's first independent Apprenticeships Store.
profiles.quote: We offer help and support to young people finding an apprenticeship that is suitable to their knowledge and skills.
profiles.body:
In January 2014, we launched the UK’s first independent Apprenticeships Store. The store can help help young people learn about apprenticeships and can offer support and advice in finding a role that is suitable for your knowledge and skills.

The store enables members of the public to:

 - register on the National Apprenticeship Service vacancy online website

 - apply for an apprenticeship vacancy
 - receive assistance with interview techniques
 - gain an insight into the workplace by speaking to current apprentices.

The Apprenticeships Store is designed to be a friendly, welcoming, informal environment where anyone can drop in at any time and get advice and help.

profiles.subtitle: Image by Bernard O'Sullivan
profiles.quote: One of the UK’s leading insurance software houses, employing over 600 people at our campus in Stockport, we remain committed to supporting our local community and workforce.

profiles.title: Dodd Group
profiles.subtitle: An employer in the building services sector.
profiles.quote: As an employer we feel strongly about bringing young people into our industry. It is a perfect chance for young talented individuals to work and earn in a supported environment.

triviaSection.name: Dog Information
triviaSection.text: Every year thousands of animals suffer from neglect, cruelty and abuse. With your help, we can end their misery. We rely on voluntary [fundraising and donations](https://www.rspca.org.uk "rspca homepage rel text") to carry out our vital work.
